website_summaries.verdict: This comfortable, affordable mattress topper is ideal for back sleepers and those who require soft to medium support.
pros: User friendly and responsive to temperature
Meets or exceeds PURGreen certification standards
cons: not always as ideal for side sleepers

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it! This topper is soft but I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it! This topper is soft but I don't feel like I'm sinking clear through it every time I turn and, I'm getting much better sleep! Only down side---my husband feels like it is too hot, though he does admit it is very comfortable. I don't feel the heat at all so it's just a difference of body temperature and reaction to the foam. We have these toppers on two adjustable twin-long beds and the sizing is perfect. Also have a lightly quilted mattress cover on top of them. Would definitely recommend this topper to anyone who wants a more comfortable mattress and a good night's sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a foam smelly cloud.
customer_reviews.text: I have a memory foam mattress, but wanted to bump up the comfort level without breaking the bank. I took a gamble on this mattress topper based on the number of positive reviews, and I'm glad I did. It's comfortable and holding up great. On the downside, it's kinda smelly when you first open it up. It took a few months for the foam smell to dissipate, even after airing it out every chance I could get. Still, it's super comfortable, comparable to the more expensive brand-names, and did I mention comfortable?
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while I was 6 months pregnant and it saved my bed from being tossed out along with my husband. This was placed on top of our very firm mattress and it worked like a charm. The best thing is that the smell which is usually overwhelming from these things was very faint and dissipated within 2 weeks and was virtually unnoticeable once we put the linen on it. I'm a side sleeper and my husband sleeps on his back and we are both very happy and wake up feeling rested.
customer_reviews.author: lili

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice alternative to the investment of a new mattress. It definitely makes a difference. I ordered to have in place following a back surgery as recommended by others who had done the same. Glad I did. Some members of the family who have tried it out have experienced that heat sensation that many foam users have complained about. I have my foam under a mattress protector so perhaps the extra layer between the skin is helpful. If you are going to use one of these, you will need "deep" fitted sheets.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality,low oder and true fit.
customer_reviews.text: Shopped the Club Warehouses and other outlets, quality not what I wanted for the price. Saw the reviews for this on Amazon and took a chance. It's a heavy box, and releasing it from it packing was the biggest challenge. But the quality,thickness and feel were impressive. It is for my elderly father and was a replacement for a twenty year old down cover. I tested it after making the bed and I was very impressed. I noticed no oder that made me want to stick it in another room for three days as suggested. Dad had no problems with the transition and making the bed is now is easy compared to realigning the old down unit. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great product, beware the initial smell, it's pretty strong.
customer_reviews.text: The proof is in the pudding as they say. Or in this case, how well rested you are the next day. When I first laid down, I thought it may be too soft. 3 inches doesn't sound like a lot, but my 180 pound frame felt enveloped by the foam. I was skeptical, but the next day I felt really rested. I've been using it for weeks now, and my body doesn't ache when I get up anymore and I feel my sleep has been more productive. Be warned though, this thing smells for days and you'll need to change the sheets after a few days before the smell level is acceptable. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: T. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable topper!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this topper. I have had some expensive mattresses and was thinking about getting another one, but wanted to try something a little cheaper first and this hit the spot. I will say it makes the overall temperature a little warmer, but it is very comfortable. Super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Really remarkable product! Don't hesitate! Worth every cent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is simply amazing! Like sleeping on a cloud. Don't hesitate to buy this product. I've now had it for several months. It makes a worn out mattress feel absolutely fantastic! Never loses its shape. Always bounces back to brand new shape. Hot or cold weather ... equally comfortable! The BEST investment you can make for a true quality product and a great sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Best money I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: Simply life changing! It redefines what my standards of what a "bed" is supposed to be. I used to wake up in the middle of the night with back pain, but we've had this a month now, and so far, no more back pain! I'm 5'10", 145lbs, and this is just just perfect for me. People were complaining about the smell, but that really wasn't an issue for us. Nothing to complain about here. This was hands down the best $140 that I've ever spent in my life. No question about it.
customer_reviews.author: Arcanine

customer_reviews.title: WOW, a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love it,especially getting it on sale. The density was better then I hoped for, and made a mattress that needed to be in a dump, actually comfortable! The mattress was so bad, we had to fill the deep sunken in spots with old flattened out firm pillows (so they would not flatten out further), and put the foam topper over that, so comfortable!! A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Truly a great investment
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this topper for over a month and it is one of the most valuable purchases I've made. I'm 25 but sleep like a baby now. The topper is perfect size, the smell went away very quick (it was not even close to as bad as people say), and I'm very happy with its quality. Suggestions: 1. Let it air out for 2-3 days (this also gives it time to expand to the proper size and the smell decreases significantly). 2. If you have a big bed to start, make sure to have a fitted sheet with a slight bit extra give so it doesn't pull off easily
customer_reviews.author: XavierD

customer_reviews.title: Like a new mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful topper. I really don't ever want to sleep on anything else. We've had a sleep number bed for about 20 years and this has made it even more comfortable. No more pressure points. We turn and rotate our topper every week, but I don't really think that's necessary. We want it to last a long time. We didn't notice any odor as some have. We did let it air about 24 hours, but I didn't feel that was a necessity. Good purchase. We've already 'sold' one to a co-worker. Interestingly enough, the price increased between the week we ordered and the week she ordered.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunnicutt

customer_reviews.title: ... recently bought a new mattress that I thought I liked but just had me tossing and turning non-stop
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a new mattress that I thought I liked but just had me tossing and turning non-stop. Gave this a try, and am sleeping much better. There is an odor that lasted probably a couple months, but was fairly easy to ignore, and it's gone now. My sheets tend to slip of the mattress and just stay on the topper, but it's not that big of a deal just need to find better sheets or get those things that keep them on. Just very happy to have a comfy bed.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress pad....was aching all over and took a long time to get up in morning....very painful hips and knees all night....NOW all my pain at night and in morning is gone...can get right up and get moving in the morning! Very comfortable and supportive!! So happy we invested in this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dunham

customer_reviews.title: had it now for about 2 weeks and i love it. my regular full size sheets sometimes come ...
customer_reviews.text: so comfotable!! very thick, did not really smell when mine arrived. had it now for about 2 weeks and i love it. my regular full size sheets sometimes come up a little on one corner bc it doesnt quite reach bottom of matress, but has not exposed any mattress pad yet. my mattress is very old (about 12-13 yrs old) and worn out, so this really brought new life to my sleeping conditions. definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danners

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best investment I have made on amazon, and I purchase items on here weekly. I have lower back issues and not only does this alleviate the pressure on my lower back when I sleep, but it also conforms to my body like I am laying in pizza dough. It's amazing and well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Esgro

customer_reviews.title: Some Minor Concerns
customer_reviews.text: Overall, we are satisfied with the purchase. There were a few minor tears from the shrink wrap but this appears to be normal per the reviews and does not seem to compromise the integrity of the pad. However, I am concerned that they may eventually cause a problem. Also, the registration process calls for a lot # which is supposed to be stamped on the pad. Four of us searched every square inch of the pad and found absolutely no # stamped anywhere on it, nor were there any packing documents with it. In reading the registration site comments, that also appears to be a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: JANE T

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping Like a Baby!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value for this product! I put it on my bed and slept like a baby. I unrolled it the day before and let it sit flat for 24 hrs and then put it on my bed. It smelled a little, but by the time I put it on my bed, it was okay. We had a previous 3 inch (blue) foam and this one is much more firmer and cool too! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ATG/Lisa Hendrick

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and cozy to sleep on. My husband used to wake up after a few hours with hip pain. Now he sleeps through the night. There was an odor at first, but we aired it out as recommended by the manufacturer and the odor faded. Only a slight odor remains that I don't notice unless I put my nose against it. It's been less than a month, so I think that will eventually disappear altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Anner

customer_reviews.title: No issues with size, I love this topper.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a California King for a regular size King because all the reviews said it was too small. Well, it wasn't and now I have a topper that is too big. I have to get out the electric knife and carve it down to size. My own fault, I should have ordered correctly. Also, I experienced a mild smell for a day maybe. Otherwise, I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: AS DSM

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: First review I have ever written. I put this on our bed over a month ago and both my husband (with chronic back pain and loves a soft mattress) and I (I like a firmer mattress) are sleeping better than ever before. I had the smell people talk about so I left it open a couple of days because I am smell sensitive but as soon as I covered it in the mattress pad and sheets I am not smelling it.
customer_reviews.author: lost on internet

customer_reviews.title: Nights Just Got More Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this topper. We left it open and unbothered for a weekend while we were out of town. The strong odor went away after a couple of weeks. I am sleeping much better than before. This is a good choice if you don't want to commit to buying a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: The smell was not half as bad as the memory foam pillows I have purchased over ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell was not half as bad as the memory foam pillows I have purchased over the years. Good quality and well packaged. I am very happy with this order. A few weeks later: Company from out of town visited for a few days. I did purchase this topper for the guest room with their stay as the main driving force for this purchase. After the first night commented on how comfortable the bed was. It only took a day to air out the smell which was as I stated earlier, not as bad as all the other memory foam purchases I have made in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Jmick

customer_reviews.title: Transforms your sleeping habits!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! Both of my parents had back surgery last year and have difficulty finding a mattress that they can sleep on without pain. With this, they sleep deeply and wake up rested and feeling good in the morning. This is a really big deal for them! I have a bad neck and back myself and will be purchasing one as well. This has transformed their sleeping habits already and we are very grateful. It does have a fairly strong odor when it first arrives, so be prepared to let it air out for a few days before you can expect to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Black

customer_reviews.title: Back pain gone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Back pain gone! I strained my back about 3 months ago working out in the yard lifting heavy logs and the pain just wouldn't go away. Then I visited my son and his guest bedroom had a bed topper. I was astonished that my back pain was gone, but when I returned home the morning after I slept in my own bed, my back was really sore again. I found a great deal for this product and my back pain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Georg

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! It's like sleeping on baby angels
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! It's like sleeping on baby angels; so soft! My husband went from a water bed to a regular bed with the foam topper and actually prefers the foam topper over the water bed. The selling point for me was the absence of chemicals in the foam. I have chemical sensitivities and had no problems with this topper.
customer_reviews.author: Jamala

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping on a Cloud!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god this is like sleeping on a cloud! My current mattress is about 10 years old but I can't afford to replace it at this time, so this was purchased in an attempt to try to get restful sleep again. The sagging areas in my mattress were so bad but this topper did the trick! Only problem is now I have a hard time getting out of bed in the morning because it's so comfortable and I don't want to leave.
customer_reviews.author: Lina H.

customer_reviews.title: the combination works great. Also
customer_reviews.text: I put this on top of a very firm tempur-pedic . For me, the combination works great. Also, several guests who have stayed with us before and commented on how the tempur-pedic was too firm for their liking, now say the mattress is just right. The new odor was a non-issue after a couple days airing in the garage. Their was still some faint smell for a week or so, but nothing strong enough to not use the bed. I'm very happy with the purchase and the company it came from.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing in the world!! I got this before I replaced my mattress to add more time to it before replacing. After I bought a new mattress for nearly $3000.00, I couldn't part with it, no mattress is as comfy as this. I recommend to everyone. If I could wrap it up, I would give it to all my family members as Xmas presents. People talk about a chemical smell, this is only right after you open it, it went away after 1-2 days.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gietl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as advertised, came a bit longer than expected (1-2" go past my mattress) but it's pretty comfortable. I've woken up with back pain for the past 2 nights but I'm not sure if it's related to something different, I'll report back if i I find it's being caused by the topper!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Too soft for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: It is too soft compared to the 14 inch memory foam mattress that I had bought for my guest room. Expected it to be more supportive.
customer_reviews.author: LaD

customer_reviews.title: Good so far...
customer_reviews.text: This looks and feels great, and I didn't notice any smell at all! Great price too. The only issue I had is that there is a hole in it. It looks like it was just an air bubble that got trapped during production, but it's pretty sizable: I can fit a finger through it. However, I sort of bought this at the last minute and I don't have time to return it and get a new one before I need it, so I'm just going to take my chances and hope it doesn't fall apart :-)
customer_reviews.author: clyph

customer_reviews.title: Mom doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom. She said she doesn't like it because it makes her just want to lay in bed all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Joel H

customer_reviews.title: I hated sleeping on my college bed
customer_reviews.text: This. Mattress. Is. My. Savior. I hated sleeping on my college bed, almost dreaded having to go to bed. Got horrible sleep at night. This mattress pad changed everything. feels wonderful to this day
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Topper added comfort to new mattress
customer_reviews.text: Topper arrived quickly. Although the odor was not terrible, we let it air out for two weeks before using. After a few weeks of use, we are happy with the topper and would recommend it to anyone looking for more comfort from your mattress. We placed the topper on a new mattress which was slightly too firm. With the topper we now sleep better and no more pressure pain.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Riemersma

customer_reviews.title: this is the ticket
customer_reviews.text: Love it. had a horrible bed and this made all the difference. It is not sink into me soft it is luxury soft hotel soft. Had no issue with smell. Aired it out on bed with ceiling fan in one day and slept on it that night no prob.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful -finally got a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter at college and she loves it. She plays basketball ball and has been bothered by back pain for over a year and those cheap mattresses in dorm rooms don't help. She noticed the difference immediately and said she finally got a good night's rest. Thank so much. This particular one was recommended by another college student.
customer_reviews.author: SUezi q

customer_reviews.title: We inserted this in the top of our mattress and ...
customer_reviews.text: We inserted this in the top of our mattress and it's made a world of difference. The chemical smell dissipated in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Still more comfortable than my current mattress so it is an upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This is really firm. I read all these reviews comparing it to marshmallows and it is nothing of the sort! Still more comfortable than my current mattress so it is an upgrade. I did not mind the smell but it is noticeable for a few days. I wish it was more like sleeping on pillows, it is a very firm memory form, hence why it springs back to shape so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: sarah cervantes

customer_reviews.title: three words
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it. After 5 years of use, our queen mattress started to sag in the middle. This not only solved that problem, but many others. The mrs and I no longer wake up to roll over in he middle of the night. We sleep long and deep. by far the best purchase i have made in a long time. Very please. High quality. Does not sleep hot (I am a very hot sleeper) light Thin We ordered a second to replace the hideaway. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ruki

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the ratings!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! That's all that really needs to be said. The 4lb density is solid, yet yields very nicely. The 3 inch thickness is great. Expansion took about 2 hours total at 70 degrees F, so it appears the expansion time on the package is a bit over-stated. As others have noted, memory foam retains heat, so having this on your bed will make thing a bit warmer. It's sized perfectly for our queen mattress (latex foam from IKEA). We purchased the Linenspa Premium Hypoallergenic Waterproof cover to go with this, and it's silent. It's highly suggested to get a waterproof cover to prevent the memory foam from absorbing sweat and such, as it doesn't ventilate like a normal mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: The best night of sleep I have had in years
customer_reviews.text: The best night of sleep I have had in years! This saved my back. I bought a brand new mattress and traded it out and was still unsatisfied. This will hands down change your life.
customer_reviews.author: LizzyZ77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ahh, I don't dread bedtime anymore because my hip doesn't hurt when I lie down on this comfy surface.
customer_reviews.author: Genhund

customer_reviews.title: I love my mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: I love my mattress topper. My rental bad was horrible and this has made it very comfortable in fact it's now delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Rosacker

customer_reviews.title: Many of my friends recommended a memory foam topper to try before spending thousands ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a memory foam mattress, but didn't want to spend alot of money. Many of my friends recommended a memory foam topper to try before spending thousands of $. What a great idea my husband and I are totally satisfied with the topper. It had a slight smell when I opened it. ( I've read all brands have a smell) We slept on the topper that night and I noticed a faint smell. No smell day 2. Great price for a good night sleep. We've been sleeping on it for a few wks now and love it.
customer_reviews.author: D Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Really great mattress topper!
customer_reviews.text: Really glad we went with this topper. It ended up perfect for my pregnancy aches, without being too soft or hot for my husband. We put it under our mattress encasement/protector and that seems to help it not be hot. The king size is enormous, so definitely don't plan on moving it all by yourself! The only downside is that our dogs now think the bed is their bed... UPDATE: One year later and this topper is still exceptional. We've had a chance to try a lot of fancy mattresses at the houses of friends and family members (including on-trend delivery mattresses like Leesa, Helix, etc.) and nothing beats our old IKEA mattress with this wonderful topper!
customer_reviews.author: C. Carnevale

customer_reviews.title: I read all the existing reviews before I made the purchase and I am pleased to report that after having used this for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Sleeping on this has helped my back immensely. I read all the existing reviews before I made the purchase and I am pleased to report that after having used this for a number of months now I can't remember why I didn't get it sooner. Very Happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Argo

customer_reviews.title: Mattress toppe
customer_reviews.text: I love this topper. Made our uncomfortable mattress almost like new. The only issue is that is slides off the edges, depending on which person moves more. I think it would be good if the topper came with a cover to hold both mattress and topper together like a fitted sheet. However, I did research and found a great one that works wonderfully and has plenty of room to tuck under the mattress. Now we sleep comfy and slip free. I would advise anyone who needs a new mattress, save your dollars, buy this topper. I bought my daughter and her husband one after we got ours. They too sleep much better now.
customer_reviews.author: frugal buyer

customer_reviews.title: Want to feel like a cherub
customer_reviews.text: Want to feel like a cherub?If you have ever imagined sleeping on a cloud, this is it!! Just do not , stress DO NOT, fold in half once opened and if carrying from place to place it will crack ... mia culpa..
customer_reviews.author: My Two Cents...

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: We have a really hard mattress and every time we'd go somewhere and stay at a hotel with a comfy I would come back and hate it a little bit more. But the fact is that mattresses are a ripoff - they sell a few dollars of materials for hundreds or thousands of dollars. So I decided to go looking for a way to add padding to our existing mattress. This goes down as one of my favorite purchases. For a fraction of the cost of a actual mattress, I have a new mattress. This makes it the most comfortable bed in the world. Now when I travel I miss my own bed rather than the other way around.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: It did have bad odor for about 3 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her full size bed. She absolutely loves it! It did have bad odor for about 3 days. But we kept the ceiling fan on and left the windows open as often as possible. That took care of the odor.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable. No major shape or smell issues.
customer_reviews.text: Works for us. I kept it in a closet for the recommended four days or so, and it expanded perfectly. The smell was subtle -- could only smell it when my face was in it, but that went away after a week or so. Very comfortable, it never moves, and it fits my queen size bed perfectly. I can't imagine an all-new mattress at 10X the price being all that much better, so I recommend this. My cats seem to like it too, but who really knows?
customer_reviews.author: Joel Schwartzberg

customer_reviews.title: Make that older mattress into a new Hybrid mattress for a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very little off gassing and supportive. Would recommend installing it underneath a cotton topper pad to aid in breathing to avoid body heat buildup. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: PreyMantas

customer_reviews.title: Less back pain than before I was even pregnant!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to extend the life of our dented pillow top mattress and it has been WONDERFUL. I'm pregnant and forced to sleep on my side all night - before I was hobbling around because of hip pain, but after two nights on this foam topper I have been having less back pain than before I was even pregnant! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Mendham

customer_reviews.title: Sleep like a baby
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amount of give and density. Noticeably firm, but while maintaining that gently cloud feeling. My boyfriend and I have the worst mattress in the world right now, but this this topper, it is like a whole new bed. I love it. Obviously, it's not quite as good as an actual new mattress, but when you're strapped for the cash that a new mattress would cost, this is amazing alternative to get you through those rough nights.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable mattress topper I have had so far. Comfortable and soft while still firm. The way it was shipped was a little odd, it was rolled up so tight that it was kind of a workout getting it unfolded in half. It had a crease in it for a few hours but after letting it settle and laying on it for a while it came right out. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 to go on top of my son's bunk bed matresses. They are soft. Feel really good. Makes his bed comfortable enough that he sleeps through the night in it.
customer_reviews.author: bookcrazy22

customer_reviews.title: No more pressure point pain!
customer_reviews.text: It made a huge difference in comfort. I felt no pressure point pains and wish I would have purchased it sooner. The price sure beat getting a new mattress by a long shot. I even got one for the guest room so I wouldn't feel guilty when I had company.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Modschiedler

customer_reviews.title: Love everything but the odor.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quicker than expected. As others have said, it does have a strong odor, that I hope goes away after time. It is extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eisele

customer_reviews.title: results in better sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I am now actually excited to go to bed every night. This mattress topper is very supportive and comfortable. I was apprehensive at first in believing that a mattress topper could actually change the way I sleep, but after the first week I can tell you that there is definitely a difference. I recommend this for anybody who has lower back issues and wants a little extra support.
customer_reviews.author: ACSmith

customer_reviews.title: 5-6hours of sleep feels like 8 hours and every morning I find myself waking ...
customer_reviews.text: My sleep has so drastically improved because of these. 5-6hours of sleep feels like 8 hours and every morning I find myself waking up more and more refreshed. I haven't had a single night of trouble falling to sleep with this and in fact and find myself hitting snooze much more in the morning because of how comfortable me bed is now.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: My Back Loves This Topper!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress topper so much!!! We had a pillow top mattress before that was way too expensive. Of course withing a couple years, it started sagging in the middle and our backs were hurting so bad. We bought a medium firm cal king mattress with no topper and then bought this for on top of it. So wonderful! Our backs were noticeably better even after one night of sleeping on this bed. We've been using our topper for about 6 months now. The best part is that when it's not good anymore, we don't have to shell out money for a brand new mattress, we'll just buy this topper again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: In Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this topper!! I did a lot of research b4 I decided to buy this particular one and I am so happy with my choice. I feel like I'm sleeping on a cloud. I can't smell anything after I put my sheets and comforter on my bed. This is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Like many others
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I read most of the reviews and decided to give this one a try. My husband had back surgery two years ago and is in less pain but still complained upon getting out of bed that his back hurt. We bought a new mattress ($1300) but he still complained. So to make a long story short I started looking for a mattress topper. When I read the reviews on this topper I was hoping it would solve his problem i.e. to start the day without back pain. He actually wakes up with a smile now. Like many others, he said it is the best night sleep he has had in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest item I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest item I have ever bought. I had bad pains from my bed. I told my wife let's try this before we buy a new bed(our bed is only a year old) because the price was unbeatable. All of my back pain is gone now and I sleep better than I ever have before. I still can't believe this pad has helped so much. Buy this for yourself and everyone you know. I'm getting this for a buddy for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bodin

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best thing I've ever spent money on. I don't wake up with aches or pains anymore and I can sleep through the whole night. My only problem now is that I never want to get out of bed!
customer_reviews.author: EAU

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I (206lbs male side sleeper) have slept on this topper (3", 4lb) for 7 nights and it is everything that they have advertised. Very comfy and not hot. No smell. I would highly recommend it. I also would suggest a Pacific Coast Basic Feather Bed Protector 230 Thread Count (on Amazon) to encase it in. BUY THEM BOTH.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So Comfortable! The only thing that isn't perfect about this was the smell, I've only had it 4 days now but it does have a smell still. I'm assuming it will go away but as of right now I just sleep with my fan on and my windows open. I'm 5'9" 140lbs and Its perfect for me. I love it! It's very well priced and if the smell goes away I'll be 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Young

customer_reviews.title: I bought this with "Density Visco 4 Pound Elastic Memory Foam Mattress Pad Bed Topper, Made in the USA, 3-Inch Thick" also from
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with "Sleep Innovations 10-Inch SureTemp Memory Foam Mattress 20-Year Warranty" also from Amazon. With this combo I have 13 inches of memory foam bliss. I did a lot of shopping, Serta, Beauty Rest, Tempurpedic and the lowest price was $1550, The highest that came close to what I now have was a Tempurpedic 12 inch for$2800. This could possibly be the best money I have ever spent $654! For me it is a perfect fit, not to soft not to hard and the only draw back I found is I don't want to get out of bed in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Wyeth

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Bought this instead of a replacement mattress and we are so glad. I fall asleep immediately now. My husband laid on a tempur-pedic mattress and he felt like he sunk in and it was difficult to move around. This mattress pad allows for the tempur-pedic effect but does not have movement restrictions. We have also heard complaints about tempur-pedic mattresses being too hot. This does not get hot. Thank God!!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: No more hip pain
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had a good Sterns and Foster bed,but we were getting hip pains,tossing and turning. Four years after spending almost 2k on the good bed(queen) size we didn't want to buy a new on . So far the foam topper has solved the problem! It didn't smell,it was easy to place on the bed and we are very happ . It's only been a week, so time will tell as to how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Avid Amazon Buyer Incredibly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This topper is simply put, bliss. 5'10" 150lb insomniac. This made my sleep quality at least 30% better, and that's a lot coming from one who puts in very sporadic sleeping hours. Completely flawless and fresh out of box. You definitely get what you pay for. This thing is great. I'm currently laying on it now and enjoying every second of life. Sleeping good honestly makes you happier. Look no further if you're looking for the best way to inexpensively improve your "good nights sleep" to a "great nights sleep."
customer_reviews.author: St. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress Topper, and Best Price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who has trouble sleeping and chose it as it is supposed to be best for back sleepers. It's working. He's sleeping. People mentioned the odor, but that was not a problem. We opened it on the porch, let it stay for a few hours and put it on the bed. I recommend it...ad the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Pianomama99

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing. I bought it for my parents because my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I bought it for my parents because my mother has an unknown neurological disease that causes uncontrollable jerking in her limbs, making it impossible for them to sleep in the same bed because my dad wouldn't be able to sleep. Every since we got it, they have been able to sleep together again without any problems. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: we sleep great.
customer_reviews.text: Speedy shipping, didnt even let it air out. The smell went away asap...my fiance loves it, we sleep great .
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Martin

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. I spent 2 years not sleeping well before ...
customer_reviews.text: You don't know what you're missing. This thing is amazing. I spent 2 years not sleeping well before I purchased this thing. It's fairly heavy, you may need help to move it around. If you like soft and comfortable things, you want this. Yes, it smells at first. The smell goes away. Don't sleep on it until the smell is gone. I would STRONGLY suggest buying a waterproof cover to go over the top of the foam topper. This will protect it from any spills or damage from use.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to everyone that left feedback on this mattress; I did receive quite an education. I have extreme back issues and arthritis to boot and I was just praying this mattress topper would do what everyone said it would.... AND IT DID!! It absolutely cannot take away serious back pain... however it has made it so that I can roll over, sleep and lay on my back without waking up 6 million times an evening. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Blazer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item for those that aren't sure they want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item for those that aren't sure they want to spend the price of a car on a 'real' bed yet!! We LOVE IT!!! It came in a cardboard box and was tightly but neatly packaged. It did however tear a bit on my husband side after a few months, but it's otherwise still working great and I am thankful that I decided to get it!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: First used it on a crappy futon mattress propped on a loft floor
customer_reviews.text: First used it on a crappy futon mattress propped on a loft floor. Did not wake up with back pains and didn't want to get up at all! Now I have it on top of a blow-up mattress I'm temporarily using while I furnish my apartment. Again, AMAZING. So comfortable, no more back pain, only con is I never want to leave bed!
customer_reviews.author: Paulatinamente

customer_reviews.title: Blown away!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Why did it take me so long to buy one of these! I have a cheap mattress that you can feel the springs pressing into your body when you sleep. I threw this baby on here and it feels like a $5000 mattress. I've never slept so well in my life. Don't hesitate to buy if you have a crappy mattress because this thing will change your life!!
customer_reviews.author: kristine thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You need to let it breathe a week or so. There's a strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Tung Chao

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful. The smell is slight and disappears after a ...
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I was looking for!! I crawl into bed and just relax into it. It's wonderful. The smell is slight and disappears after a few days. I do have to get different sheets..the fitted doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frommel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Arrived as promised. Had to let it fluff up for a couple of days prior to use. Only drawback that I can find with it is that it definitely retains the heat (which I guess will be good during the winter).
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a baby
customer_reviews.text: WOW! What an amazing mattress topper. I have only had it for about a week now but can say, this is some of the best sleep I have had. We recently bought a cheap mattress and our backs were hurting every morning. After this topper it feels like we paid A LOT of money but didn't. I haven't slept on a bed more comfortable than ours now. I would highly recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: ashley kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased Except I'm Still Experiencing Hip Pain
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new mattress topper with one exception. One of the main reasons I bought it was because of other reviews that people had written stating that they had hip pain during the night and that this mattress topper had put an end to the hip pain that they experienced during the night. I have continued to experience hip pain during the night since I started sleeping on my new mattress topper, much to my disappointment. However, I have found that this mattress topper is much cooler to sleep on than all of the other mattress toppers that I have tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. my arms and hands used to fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. my arms and hands used to fall asleep, and I would have hip pain and these things would wake me up 4-6 times a night. No more arms/hands & hips waking me up. We are getting a more restful sleep and waking up 1 or 2 times now. We followed the recommendations of other reviewers... open it up, let it air out (we aired it out in a spare bedroom for 24 hours) and I also purchased a "cool" mattress protector to go over it. We have had no issues with smell at all after doing these things.
customer_reviews.author: butler1

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing. When you first lay on it
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is amazing. When you first lay on it, it seems a bit weird. But when you sleep, it feels amazing. I normally always have some kind of pain while sleeping and lots of pain when I wake up and it's really hard to fall asleep. There was no tossing and turning and no pain during or after sleep and I fell asleep pretty quickly. It only took a couple of hours for it to expand, so we decided to use it right away. The smell was pretty bad if you like to sleep with your head under the covers. If you have issues with the smell, let it air out for at least 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: J. LaiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Amazing difference.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing difference...I bought this to go over my extra firm mattress, that was killing me...I woke everyday in pain...and not rested...so we thought we would try this before buying a new mattress....I'm so glad I did....No joke people I've been sleeping on this a week or so....no more pain and I feel so refreshed when I awake....Gosh I only wish I would have bought this sooner...Great product and service...
customer_reviews.author: phillip pettay

customer_reviews.title: Great buy to soften up a firm mattress
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I love this thing. Super soft. Makes getting out of bed difficult in the mornings. I got it after a couple months after buying a king sized memory foam mattress on Amazon that turned out to be a tad bit firmer than we both would have liked but now vested in about $750 worth of mattress that we LOVE beats the heck out of $4000 we would have spent on one at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: SUPER COMFORTABLE.
customer_reviews.text: I have this for my dorm and I've never gotten a bad nights rest. My friends love it and want to buy the same one. It is extremely comfortable. When I removed it from the box, it sprang up very quickly. I didn't need t wait long for this to expand. It is very hard to get out of bed because of how comfortable it is though.
customer_reviews.author: Too Ironic for Reality

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a topper for a 24" thick inflatable ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a topper for a 24" thick inflatable for guests and it works very well. The combination almost makes you forget its a temporary setup.
customer_reviews.author: NovelParts

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Note that it needs to be off0gassed as the product has a strong chemical smell. But after about a week its ready for use and is very comfortable. I've had two back surgeries and it has helped me immensely. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: It's like I'm sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: It's like I'm sleeping on a cloud. I'm a side sleeper and this in conjunction with a memory foam pillow has alleviated a lot of my neck and shoulder pain and I tend to sleep through the night more often.
customer_reviews.author: en_fuego

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing! It took my hard
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It took my hard, uncomfortable mattress and made it feel like new again. The thickness is perfect, not too thin but not to thick where I feel like I'm sinking into it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Ifer

customer_reviews.title: awesome nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: We love the added comfort it has given our bed. It only took a couple of hours for the mattress pad to expand. For the price, it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Camerer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable if you have arthritis or joint pain. Not to warm. Excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Waksmunski

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great price. Keep in mind that memory foam is a tiny bit warmer than an innerspring mattress. This could be great in the winter, but might be an issue in the summer in a hot climate. I bought one and loved it so I bought one for each of my teenagers.
customer_reviews.author: W. ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: ... of an air mattress I bought and it was great! Has that nice density that we are used ...
customer_reviews.text: Put this on top of an air mattress I bought and it was great! Has that nice density that we are used to on our M-Lily bed.
customer_reviews.author: littlemama

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best toppers you can buy in my opinion. I did research on these type of products and this one had the suggested density of the foam. We have been using it for several months now and it is great....just the correct support and my wifes hip bursa pain is much better
customer_reviews.author: Happy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The topper immediately expanded upon opening. Put on the bed that night and had a wonderful night's sleep for the first time since buying our new mattress. Lower back pain and sciatica was MUCH improved the next morning. Thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: TC

product_meta.title: Queen Size 3 Inch Thick, 4 Pound Density Gray Visco Elastic Memory Foam Mattress Pad Bed Topper. Made in the USA
feature_bullets: Instantly makes any mattress more restful, comfortable and supportive in sagging areas of mattress
3-Inch of extra supportive 4-Pounds memory foam conforms to your body perfectly
Made in the USA using enviromentally friendly processes. Exceeds PURGreen certification standards
Memory foam reduces pressure points that cause you to toss and turn, so you sleep better
Topper features a four-pound density and the famous gel-like feel.
